name: The most realistic survival game EVER
name_original: The most realistic survival game EVER
description:
*** THIS GAME IS UNFINISHED, THERE'S NO WIN OR LOSE CONDITION ***

Made for the GMTK 2018 game jam. Genre without mechanic, Survival without resources to gather or things to build.

***** Updated ***** (Can't update it, expect the update after the GameJam finishes)
- Now there's a "win condition".
- Bigger UI.
- Added a Hungry bar.

This project has been put on hold for now. The development will continue  around mid Novemeber, expect some major updates, here's a glimpse of things that will come to this game:

- A city, you'll be able to go out, forget about that hiddeous appartment.
- Minigames: if you check the game console it tells you that it is the only real game mechanic, it was originally intended to have mini-games in the same theme of the game jam, like a Bullet Hell where you can't shoot (someone did that in the Jam, go check his game out) but I run out of time, expect some of those ideas.
- A full-fledged story.
- Well thought comedy instead of fourth wall breaking stuff.
- And more...! LuL
